Hellplague:
 
Fire began to rain down on Hellplague, so she threw one wing up to try and block a few shots at least.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord 

Windlord aimed and shot 25 times towards HellPlague 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> The femme seizes the oppertunity.  She brings her legs up, sticks 
one under each of his arms.  She then straightens out her entire 
body from a creshindo to a straight line, slamming rodimus into the 
gound, pinned unde her legs.  She arches her back so he can't try 
the same thing.
> 
> Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus stopped punching in order to use both arms to grab 
Hellplague's and prevent her from ripping out his optics. He was 
struggling to fight her arm back. This weakened his pin as his 
weight was no longer all ontop of her.
> 
> 
> robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> She was suprised she was pinned under the Maximal commander.  She 
was being punched in the head and face, so she grabbed Rodimus's 
face and tried to pop his optics out.
> 
> Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> As the dust went up Rodimus expected an attack. Afterall he had 
just used this trick. As Hellplague checked him Roddy went down. He 
kept hold though and rolled through, pinning Hellplague to the 
ground. Roddy then went for a series of punches to the head.
> 
> 
>
